title: Sidewall, 1813–23
provenance: Used in Duke of York's bedroom, the Royal Pavilion, Brighton.
creditline: Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum
description: Repeating paper probably used for a border. Bamboo trellis, diagonal bamboo strips forming squares some of which are crossed with smaller strips of bamboo. Printed on pale blue ground.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1813–23.
1813–23. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum. 1950-59-8.
